::: {#hero-heading}

Emma Marshall is a graduate student in the dual JD/Ph.D. Law-Psychology and Social Cognitive Program at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln in Dr. Eve Brank's [Law and Policy Lab](https://psychology.unl.edu/ebrank). 

When not working on her dissertation, Emma enjoys unnecessarily complicated board-games, spending time with her dog [Fitz](https://ap-ls.org/resources/pets/posts/fitz/) and talking about herself in the third-person.
